articles.author: Matthew Cranston
articles.title: US inflation hits a new 40-year high of 8.6pc - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: America’s inflation surged still higher, driven by gas, rent and the cost of food at home, putting a potential 75 basis point rate rise on next week’s agenda.
articles.content: Surveys show that Americans see high inflation as the nations top problem, and most disapprove of Mr Bidens handling of the economy. Republicans are hammering Democrats on the issue in the run-up to … [+3582 chars]

articles.title: Key takeaways emerge during prime-time hearing into attack on the U.S. Capitol - CBC News
articles.description: U.S. House investigators made the case to the American public in a prime-time hearing on Thursday that the violent storming of the Capitol by former U.S. president Donald Trump's supporters should not be forgotten.
articles.content: U.S. House investigators made the case to the American public in a prime-time hearing on Thursday that the violent insurrection by former U.S. president Donald Trump's supporters should not be forgot… [+4099 chars]
